metadata.title: CVE-2024-26146 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Rack is a modular Ruby web server interface. Carefully crafted headers cancause header parsing in Rack to take longer than expected resulting in apossible denial of service issue. Accept and Forwarded headers areimpacted. Ruby 3.2 has mitigations for this problem, so Rack applicationsusing Ruby 3.2 or newer are unaffected. This vulnerability is fixed in2.0.9.4, 2.1.4.4, 2.2.8.1, and 3.0.9.1.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
